大家好～1.01 版本已经在群文件发布了，更新如下：
Hello everyone! Version 1.01 has been released in the group files, with the following updates:

# 新的特性
电子元件会在一个短暂的过程后损坏，而非立即损坏。清空桌面现在会显示一个确认界面。支持撤销导线、元件的创建和删除。用电器现在显示交变电流的有效值。(PC) 可以通过 Esc 键退出应用了。# 新的元件新增了灵敏电流计。新增了学生电源（交直流理想电源）。# 元件性质的调整干电池现在拥有可调节的内阻，不再是理想电源。白炽灯泡现在拥有伏安特性参数，不再是理想电阻。电阻定律实验器现在采用真实公式计算，参数可调。隐藏了接线板 3 和 4。# BUG 修复修复了Editor属性时单位换算导致的问题。接线柱箭头不再显示跳跃动画。某些电路接法可能存在运算错误的问题。

New Features
Electronic components will be damaged after a short process, rather than immediately. The desktop clearing function now displays a confirmation interface. Supports undoing, creating, and deleting wires and components. The multimeter now displays the effective value of alternating current. (PC) You can exit the application by pressing the Esc key.

# New Components
Added a sensitive ammeter. Added a student power supply (ideal AC/DC power supply).

# Component Property Adjustments
Dry batteries now have adjustable internal resistance and are no longer ideal power sources. Incandescent bulbs now have voltage and current characteristics and are no longer ideal resistors. The resistor law experiment device now uses real formulas for calculation, with adjustable parameters. Hid connectors 3 and 4.

# Bug Fixes
Fixed the issue of unit conversion when editing properties in the Editor. The wire arrow no longer displays a jumping animation. Some circuit connections may have calculation errors.
建议pc版增加一个退出按键功能，现在很多地区都用的是触屏一体机，没有实体键盘
It's recommended to add an exit button function to the PC version, as many regions now use all-in-one touch screens without physical keyboards.

Yeah... I'll make up for it in the next update. PC updates are usually the fastest, and I estimate it'll be ready by this weekend.

v1.0.2 - 17/11/29
# 新的特性多语言支持：日语、德语、法语。初步支持了电路元件到电路图的转换。在最新的 iOS 设备上支持增强现实模式。使各类电表的 3D 外观更加逼真。# 更新预告下一版本将提供万用表以及电表调零。下一版本将提供交流电波形显示功能。下一版本将提供电容器、通电螺线管。# 元件性质的调整干电池现在可以是理想电源。所有电表现在可以切换理想 / 现实模式。# 特别提示Esc 快捷键现在会最小化窗口。Ctrl+E 快捷键可以切换考试和普通模式。

v1.0.2 - 17/11/29
# New features: 
Multi-language support: Japanese, German, French. 
Preliminary support for converting circuit components to circuit diagrams. 
Support for enhanced reality mode on the latest iOS devices. 
Making the 3D appearance of various meters more realistic. 
# Update Preview 
The next version will provide a multimeter and zeroing function. 
The next version will provide AC waveform display functionality. 
The next version will provide capacitors and solenoid valves. 
# Component Property Adjustments 
Dry batteries can now be ideal power sources. 
All meters can now switch between ideal and real modes. 
# Special Reminder 
The Esc shortcut key will now minimize the window. 
The Ctrl+E shortcut key can switch between exam and normal modes.
